channel.title: CVE Feed for E4J s.r.l. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for E4J s.r.l. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27863|2024-09-16T19:57:01.673Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikbooking%20hotel%20booking%20engine%20%26%20pms%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Sensitive Information Exposure in E4J s.r.l. VikBooking Hotel Booking Engine & PMS plugin <= 1.5.3 on WordPress allows attackers to get the booking data by guessing / brute-forcing easy predictable booking IDs via search POST requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-32780|2024-06-04T17:49:59.787Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikrentcar
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in E4J s.R.L. VikRentCar.This issue affects VikRentCar: from n/a through 1.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32780|2024-08-02T02:20:35.329Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikrentcar
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in E4J s.R.L. VikRentCar.This issue affects VikRentCar: from n/a through 1.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-39653|2024-08-29T14:48:26.275Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikrentcar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in E4J s.R.L. VikRentCar allows SQL Injection.This issue affects VikRentCar: from n/a through 1.4.0.
